channel.title: NPC's Health
channel.description:
How do I make like Aubury, or another shopkeeper's health 0? This reason I want this is to make it so if someone attacks the shops, they instantly die, so they dont get scattered across the world =/
Things I've tried: Going to NPC.cfg and changing their health Reason why it wont work: Cuz Aubury already has 0 hp, same with all other shop keepers, but if you mage them, they have more hp.
Anyone know how to fix this?

item.title: NPC's Health
item.dc:creator: @Ice_Age_Elmo Ice Age Elmo
item.description:
@Ice_Age_Elmo wrote:

Hmm…I’ll try, thanks for fast response, less than 1 minute =0

Read full topic

item.title: NPC's Health

item.description:
@Ice_Age_Elmo wrote:

How do I make like Aubury, or another shopkeeper’s health 0?
This reason I want this is to make it so if someone attacks the shops, they instantly die, so they dont get scattered across the world =/

Things I’ve tried:
Going to NPC.cfg and changing their health
Reason why it wont work:
Cuz Aubury already has 0 hp, same with all other shop keepers, but if you mage them, they have more hp.

Anyone know how to fix this?
